result.execSummary:
Marcus E. Grant was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Marcus E. Grant was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marcus E. Grant

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Carmen Lassiter (in 14CF436 & 14CF870).  Clerk: MHerr.
MINUTES:  9:36am-  Matter heard with 14CF436 & 14CF870.  DE waived right to an attorney.  DE waives his right to an extradition hearing.  Waiver is signed by the DE and the Court.

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Carmen Lassiter (in 14CF436 & 14CF870).  Clerk: MHerr.
MINUTES:  4:23pm-  Matter heard with 14CF870 & 14CF436.  DE wishes to proceed pro se on this case.  Discussion held.  Court will not proceed today & adjourns extradition hearing to January 16, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Bond continued.
12/10/2014 Extradition hearing is rescheduled to 1/7/2015 at 3pm - to be heard w/ DE's other cases currently scheduled for a sentencing hearing (14CF870 & 14CF436).

211pm
  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in custody.  Clerk LE.  Referredt o Br 7 for further dispo on 12/10/14 @ 11am.  Extradition Waiver Hrg.  Deft wished to waive extradtion.  $2000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).
and witness list filed by the State
